nodes.text: The Artesia system was a star system located within the Hangshan sector, a part of the galactic regions known as the Slice and the Expansion Region. It contained the planet Artesia.

The Artesia system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which was authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace. The Appendix section of The Essential Atlas placed the system within grid square P-12, although this was contradicted by its placement in grid square P-11 in the book's map of the Expansion Region. The Essential Atlas Online Companion later confirmed the placement of the Artesia system in grid square P-11.
